languages.text:
На некоторых мирах, наиболее пригодных для жизни, можно развивать собственные колонии.
За выполнение проектов и событий колоний Вольный Торговец получает уникальные награды, которые нельзя обрести иначе.

Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.
languages.original_text:
На некоторых мирах, наиболее пригодных для жизни, можно развивать собственные колонии.
За выполнение проектов и событий колоний Вольный Торговец получает уникальные награды, которые нельзя обрести иначе.

traits.locale_text:
Certain worlds, usually the most habitable ones, are suitable for establishing colonies that can be developed.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained any other way.

Certain worlds, usually the most habitable ones, are suitable for establishing colonies that can be developed.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained any other way.

Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

languages.text:
Solo ciertos mundos, por lo general los más habitables, son adecuados para fundar colonias fructíferas adecuadas para el desarrollo.
Completar proyectos y eventos de colonia puede otorgar a tu Comerciante Independiente recompensas únicas que no puede obtener de otro modo.
languages.original_text:
Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

traits.locale_text:
Solo ciertos mundos, por lo general los más habitables, son adecuados para fundar colonias fructíferas adecuadas para el desarrollo.
Completar proyectos y eventos de colonia puede otorgar a tu Comerciante Independiente recompensas únicas que no puede obtener de otro modo.

languages.text:
開発可能かつ将来的に繁栄するコロニーの設立に適しているのは特定の惑星、通常は最も居住可能な惑星だけだ。
プロジェクトやコロニーイベントを完了することで、自由開拓者は他の手段では得られない独自の報酬を得ることができる。
languages.original_text:
Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

traits.locale_text:
特定の惑星、通常は最も居住可能な惑星だけが、開発に十分な将来的に繁栄するコロニーの設立に適している。
プロジェクトやコロニーイベントを完了することで、自由開拓者は他の手段では得られない独自の報酬を得ることができる。

languages.text:
只有最适合居住的特定世界，才适合建立繁荣的殖民地，进行开发。
通过完成项目与殖民地事件，行商浪人可以获得独特的奖励，这些奖励无法通过其他方式获得。
languages.original_text:
Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

traits.locale_text:
只有最适合居住的特定世界，才适合建立繁荣的殖民地，进行开发。
通过完成项目与殖民地事件，行商浪人可以获得独特的奖励，这些奖励无法通过其他方式获得。

languages.text:
Nur bestimmte Welten, in der Regel die bewohnbarsten, eignen sich für die Gründung florierender Kolonien, die reif für die Entwicklung sind.
Der Abschluss von Projekten und Ereignissen in Kolonien kann dem Freihändler einzigartige Belohnungen einbringen, die er auf keine andere Weise erhalten kann.
languages.original_text:
Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

traits.locale_text:
Nur bestimmte Welten, in der Regel die bewohnbarsten, eignen sich für die Gründung florierender Kolonien, die reif für die Entwicklung sind.
Der Abschluss von Projekten und Ereignissen in Kolonien kann dem Freihändler einzigartige Belohnungen einbringen, die er auf keine andere Weise erhalten kann.

languages.text:
Seuls certains mondes, généralement les plus habitables, sont propices à l'établissement de colonies florissantes et à même de se développer.
En menant à bien des projets et en participant à des événements organisés dans les colonies, le libre-marchand peut obtenir des récompenses uniques inaccessibles par d'autres moyens.
languages.original_text:
Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
Yalnızca belli başlı dünyalar, genellikle de en yaşanabilir olanlar, gelişme potansiyeline sahip koloniler kurmaya uygundur.
Projeleri tamamlamak ve koloni olaylarıyla ilgilenmek, Hür Tacir'e başka hiçbir yolla elde edemeyeceği eşsiz ödüller kazandırabilir.
languages.original_text:
Only certain worlds, usually the most habitable, are suitable for establishing thriving colonies ripe for development.
Completing projects and colony events can earn the Rogue Trader unique rewards that cannot be obtained through any other means.
